I'm working on issue #10255 Make the settings avatar delete/edit UI slicker.
is this expected design? avatar-delete-edit-UI-slicker.gif @Tim Abbott @Steve Howell
@Jagan S yeah, something like that! I would add a delay to uploading (either via throttling network in the browser developer tools or a time.sleep(5) in the backend to show the loading spinner.

Thanks @Tim Abbott I'm working on spinner part now and yes I changed throttling and reduce the internet speed to show the spinner.
I think we need to change the spinner.
Our current spinning is very small,thin and gray in color which is not visible while uploading black images , so which spinner am I suppose to use ?

hi @Tim Abbott, I put the spinner on user-settings-avatar avatar_spinner.gif
I think we should introduce a new spinner since our old spinner is very thin and can you tell me how the spinner
should look like, where it should be placed and should we need any text near it like uploading an avatar kinda?
@Jagan S yeah, I think we could get rid of the "Uploading ..." text and just have a wider/larger spinner centered in the box during the upload process.
@Tim Abbott what about the color of the spinner ? or we could use a white spinner and black background during the uploading process so that the spinner will be visible

@Jagan S I'm not sure what the right approach is, but we should definitely make sure the spinner is visible; probably doing a white/black background (based on theme) would work, but I'm open to anything that looks good.
ok @Tim Abbott ill try my level best

Hi @Tim Abbott, I have put the spinner in the centre of the box. is this design ok ? or need any changes?
avatar_upload_spinner.gif
@Jagan S looks good enough; I'd submit that and we can always iterate from there.
sure @Tim Abbott I made a PR #14466, please review
